title: Kanye's $200 STEM Player - Donda 2
description: Would you pay $200 to listen to Donda 2 on Kanye West's STEM Player? Weirdest Amazon Reviews:  Steam Chromebook:  2022 Apple Event Leaks:  Galaxy S22 is Boring:  Steam Deck Doesn't Suck:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:08 Donda Exclusive to Stem Player 0:31 It looks like a $5 bluetooth speaker.. 0:55 Can it play other music? 1:08 Stem player Demo 1:48 Its not perfect.. 2:20 Weve never had this before 2:50 This is not a random bit of tech.. 3:38 Is it just a cash grab? 4:16 Would we talk about this if Donda 2 wasnt exclusive? 4:40 Will Apple follow suit? 5:10 Better pay rates than Spotify? 5:30 Kanye isnt the first to try this.. 7:22 Im gonna attack you 8:00 Youre too poor to listen to my music.. 9:04 Will other artists try this? 9:54 Does this break the status quo? 10:22 What do you think? 10:47 DONDA RELEASED?
